properties.areaDesc: Wayne; Perry; Bollinger; Ripley; Carter; Butler
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:04PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...Wintry Mix expected in the Foothills region of southeast
Missouri tonight and early Thursday...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...Portions of southeast Missouri, generally along and
west of a line from Doniphan, Zalma, and Lithium Missouri.
This includes the Missouri counties of Carter, Ripley, Butler,
Wayne, Bollinger, and Perry.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light mix of snow, sleet, and freezing
rain is expected. Freezing rain will become the biggest concern
overnight through 6 AM CST Thursday along the southeast
Missouri Foothills. After that time, temperatures should rise
above freezing and conditions should improve quickly.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for southeast Missouri can be found by
visiting modot.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY
